greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = Sum_{k=0..n} (-n)^(n-k) * binomial(2*k,k) * binomial(2*n+1,2*k).
mathematica: a[n_] := Sum[If[n == n - k == 0, 1, (-n)^(n-k)] * Binomial[2*k, k] * Binomial[2*n+1, 2*k], {k, 0, n}]; Array[a, 20, 0] (* _Amiram Eldar_, Apr 29 2021 *)
results.author: _Seiichi Manyama_, Aug 28 2020
